oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-09-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 12, 1959. Featuring David Cobb (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer - although Don Gibson was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Carl Smith, and regular performers Minnie Pearl, the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1040th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Ray Price; Carl Smith; Del Wood; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: David Cobb introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ray Price) (recording) -- David Cobb introduces Carl Smith -- The Tall, Tall Gentleman (Carl Smith) -- David Cobb introduces Del Wood -- Gizmo Rag (Del Wood) -- David Cobb and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- Our Song Of Love (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Cobb, David (Announcer); Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Wagoner, Porter; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Price, Ray, 1926-2013
